question: Kishore Sansi Managing Director and CEO of this bank won the 'Personality of the Year' award.
explanation: Kishore Sansi Managing Director and CEO of Vijaya Bank conferred the 'Personality of the Year' award by Skoch Consultancy Services. The award is part of the 'Skoch Banking and Financial Leadership' series. Past recipients of the award include C Rangarajan, Dilip Parekh and Nandan Nilekani.
